attributes.action: "driving while using a mobile phone" to "driving without due care and attention"
attributes.background: If driving while using a mobile phone was included in the more serious offence of driving without due care and attention, which is what it actually is, it would carry more social stigma and be become less acceptable.

rejection.details:
